featureType.name: wq_derived
featureType.title: FeatureType derived from a SQL query
featureType.abstract: FeatureType derived from the following SQL query: SELECT station_no, station_name as sitename,anzlic_no, project_no, sample_collection_date || determinand_code as id, sample_collection_date, determinand_description, results_value, longitude as x, -latitude as y FROM wq_ir_results WHERE 1=1 order by station_no
